name: netvisor
description: NetVisor is a self-hosted network visualization and analytics tool that provides charts and insights into network activity, bandwidth usage, and device behavior with a beautiful UI.
features: Network visualization: Interactive charts and graphs display network activity and traffic patterns.
Bandwidth monitoring: Track data usage by device, protocol, or time period for capacity planning.
Device analytics: View detailed statistics for each connected device including traffic and connections.
Traffic analysis: Identify bandwidth-heavy applications and services consuming network resources.
Historical data: Store and review network metrics over time to identify trends and anomalies.
Beautiful UI: Modern, intuitive interface makes complex network data easy to understand.
Real-time updates: Live dashboards refresh automatically to show current network state.
Protocol breakdown: See traffic distribution across HTTP, HTTPS, DNS, and other protocols.
Top talkers: Identify devices or services generating the most network traffic.
Custom time ranges: Analyze network behavior over specific periods from hours to months.
Export reports: Generate network usage reports for documentation or billing purposes.
Lightweight deployment: Minimal resource requirements suitable for running on network edge devices.
